However, this new finding suggests that the virus can linger in the air for hours and can infect people who happen to be in the same area as an infected person. This revelation has made it all the more important for people to wear masks and practice social distancing. Experts advise people to avoid crowded areas and to stay indoors as much as possible. If anyone experiences symptoms such as fever, cough, or shortness of breath they should contact their healthcare provider immediately. In summary, COVID-19 is now believed to be airborne, making it even more important for people to take all necessary precautions to avoid contracting the virus. Stay safe, stay indoors, and wear your masks!

The discovery that the COVID-19 virus is airborne is a major breakthrough in the fight against the pandemic.
